page.title: 07FARMING
page.content:
at 7.30am and finish at 5.00pm. Machinery used by the workers,and owned by the farm includes a combine harvester ,tractors and other vehicles. Crops planted include barley , wheat , carrots and a cross of wheat and rye , planting occurs in September and harvesting takes place the following July and August. Roe Deer are found at Home Farm but are not thought to cause much damage to young trees or crops.
In 1940 Mr Graham inherited Queenstonbank from his uncle.The farm is 420 acres of which 150 acres is wheat,150 acres is barley and the yield of 3 to 4 tons per acre is sold to grain merchants. There is 45 acres of potatoes which go to potato merchants,32 acres of peas{(cont.P8)
